Title: Libratone Q Adapt Lightning In-Ear Noise Cancelling Earbuds for Apple Devices
Body (HTML):
Description

Libratone Q Adapt In-Ear: because you decide how much of the world to let in. Q Adapt features Libratone’s Signature Sound Profile designed to provide a full range of crisp, clear, enhanced sound. The Q Adapt In-Ear offers 4 levels of CityMix Adjustable Noise Cancellation for your Lightning connected iOS device. Level 1: Keep the music playing while still letting in 80% of outside sound. Talk to people around you without removing your headphones. Level 2: Enjoy your music with maximum awareness and safety with 60% of outside sound, making them great for commuting. Level 3: Stay focused by blocking outside noise while still allowing people to get your attention when needed. It’s perfect for a busy office or studying in public. Level 4: Totally immerse yourself in sound by blocking 100% of outside noise whether traveling by plane or simply silencing your world. CityMix ANC allows you to enjoy music at any volume by activating the ANC to cancel outside noise, then play on. Because simplicity is everything, the four-button remote lets you access CityMix, activate the Hush function, Play, Pause, make and take calls, or crank up the volume. Unlike other noise-cancelling, in-ear headphones, Q Adapt draws power directly from your iOS device. The lightning-powered earbuds are more efficient, too – they won’t drain your battery, so you can use ANC for 50+ hours on an iPhone 6 Plus or 7. Libratone Q Adapt In-Ear headphones are compatible with iOS devices with a lightning port including iPhone 5, Phone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6/6 Plus, iPhone 6S/6S Plus, iPhone SE, iPhone 7/7 Plus, iPad (4th gen), iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad Pro (9.7' and 12.9' models) iPad Mini (1st gen), iPad Mini 2, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 4, iPod Nano (7th gen), iPod Touch (5th gen), and iPod Touch (6th gen). Libratone is proud to offer the best lightning headphones on the market, so we provide a 30-day money-back guarantee and we're here to help you with 24/7 US based customer support for all of our products.


4 LEVELS OF NOISE CONTROL – CityMix adjustable noise cancelling earphones means that you can choose how much of the outside world you want to let in. Keep the music level low or the world out – it’s up to you. Minimize background noise and maximize your audio. Customize and enhance your listening experience like never before with Libratone Q Adapt – Simply plug and go today. Connectivity Technology: Wired
LIGHTNING POWERED – Designed specifically for and powered by iOS devices, Libratone Q Adapt Earbuds have almost no impact on your phone’s battery life. Listen for up to 52 hours with no bulky battery packs.
PREMIUM SOUND QUALITY – Our signature sound profile features a balance of enhanced Deep Bass, Full Midrange, Clear Vocals and Crisp High Tones to ensure that all music sounds amazing.
THE POWER OF FOUR – Four buttons are all you need to control Q Adapt In Ear. Use the remote to increase and decrease volume, skip tracks, activate the “Hush” function, answer calls and activate and adjust Active Noise Cancellation. Q Adapt’s lightweight cord resists tangling and wire breakage..TAKE CALLS – Q Adapt’s built-in microphone helps quiet the outside world during phone calls and lets you take calls hands-free and noise free. Q Adapts super comfortable in-ear headphones are designed for prolonged usage with extra ear bud fittings and a carrying case.
Materials and finish- braided tangle-free cord. Interchangeable ear tips- Comes with three different sizes for a snug and seamless fit
From the AUTHORIZED DEALER.
WARRANTY if it's a defective piece.

Body (HTML):
Description

Create perfect 8'x 8' square cakes that bake evenly and pop effortlessly out of the pan every time. From beautifully sculpted cake layers to fudgy brownies and gingerbread, the integrated steel frame provides secure handling while silicone offers non-stick properties and flexibility for easy release. Pans come in a 'fashionable' two-colour finish and are freezer, microwave, dishwasher and oven safe with a heat resistance to 428 DegreeF/220 DegreeC.


Silicone bakeware with integrated steel structure for safe handling, 8 x 8 inches
Perfect browning and easy release
Cake pan is BPA free
Oven, microwave and freezer safe
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
Original Trudeau design, Lifetime warranty

Title: Libratone ZIPP Nordic Black Portable Bluetooth Speakers
Body (HTML):
ZIPP is modern wireless music for the home. The Libratone ZIPP offers 360° sound for a unique full-room sound experience. You’ll never have to sacrifice sound quality for portability with ZIPP’s deep bass, full midrange, and crisp highs. Connect over Bluetooth, WiFi, Airplay (iOS), Airplay 2 (Coming soon), or DLNA (Android) and enjoy sound that can be heard throughout the whole room. Add in the 100-watt speaker power, and you have a superior acoustic experience above the rest. Designed for ultra-portability, ZIPP is the best portable speaker for multi-room listening. Simply pick it up with the attached strap and place it in the kitchen, bedroom, or deck – wherever you want awesome sound. ZIPP is completely battery-operated and needs no AC cord. And with a 10+ hour battery life, you can enjoy music all day long. Stream anything – and we mean anything. Stream all of your favorite audio and video apps natively, including Amazon Music, Apple Music, Pandora, Netflix, YouTube, and future apps. You can even stream Spotify Connect and Internet Radio directly from ZIPP without needing your phone. ZIPP meets your need for Spotify speakers without sacrificing your other favorite music services. Redefine multi-room sound by connecting up to six ZIPP speakers over Wi-Fi to experience immersive sound in one area or spread over multiple rooms. ZIPP is also Amazon Alexa Compatible! Plug in or pair your ZIPP speaker to your Amazon Dot, Tap or Echo and you can instantly add Alexa voice control to your speaker(s). Customise your sound. Choose from the original ZIPP, which measures 12.2 x 26.1 inches and provides 100 watts of power or ZIPP MINI which measures 8.8” x 3.9'' and provides 60 watts of power. ZIPP comes in four different colors: Cloudy Grey, Deep Lagoon, Graphite Gray, and Victory Red. We also offer special edition Nordic Black. Our stylish Scandinavian design looks great in any room. Libratone is proud to offer you the best multi-room speakers on the market. That’s why we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. In addition, we are here to help you with 24/7 US based customer support for all Libratone products.


AMAZING SOUND: Our biggest and best sounding speaker featuring Libratone’s award winning signature sound that delivers deep bass, full midrange, crisp highs, 100-watts of power, and 360° FullRoom acoustics.
WIFI & BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY: Use WiFi for longest range and high fidelity music quality, or Bluetooth to stream from any device. Also supports Airplay (iOS), AirPlay 2 (coming soon), DLNA (Android) and Spotify Connect.
PAIR UP TO 6 ZIPPS: Create immersive SoundSpaces in one room or multiple rooms (or outside). Add additional speakers to your home audio system whenever you are ready.
TRULY WIRELESS: 10+ hour rechargeable battery--unlike other speakers that require AC power--convenient carrying handle, easy setup, intuitive touch-control interface, speakerphone, and easy to use App.
STREAMS ALL APPS NATIVELY: Plays all audio and video apps directly from your device--no proprietary app needed like other wireless speakers. Stream Spotify, Pandora, Netflix, Amazon Music, iTunes and more!
AMAZON ALEXA COMPATIBLE: Pair or plug in your Amazon Dot, Tap or Echo to any ZIPP speaker and instantly add Amazon Alexa voice control.
ALWAYS GETTING SMARTER: Libratone is constantly adding new features to your ZIPP speakers through free firmware updates available through the Libratone App. Faster startup times, sleep mode, preset Spotify Playlist and more!

﻿

Title: Inpro Solar Square Wilgen Metal 50cm
Body (HTML):
The Solar Wind Turbine uses a photovoltaic solar cell to generate electricity from sunlight. This electricity drives a miniature motor that turns the rotor blades and lights up an LED. The stronger the sunlight, the faster the blades will turn. Exceptional quality and craftsmanship, all of Inpro Solar's products are made in Germany and make excellent executive gifts. The solar cells used in Inpro Solar toys and models generate electricity when the sun shines on them. This electricity is used to drive a small motor that then turns a wheel or rotor blade, making the models move in sunlight. Truly the magic of the universe! They will also work under a halogen spotlight, but not under fluorescent or neon light tubes, energy-saving light bulbs or LED.

Aluminum metal solar wind turbine generates electricity from light
As the sun shines on the solar panel, rotor blades spin and an LED lights up
Exceptional quality and craftsmanship, made in Germany
Solar cells are encapsulated in a flexible space-approved polymer
No batteries required - works with the power of sunlight or a halogen lamp

Title: Inpro Solar 14 in 1 Educational Solar Toy Roll-E
Body (HTML): The solar powered robot can be transformed into 14 different robot modes which include a multitude of comical and functional movements. The robot kit provides unique accessories (included) and parts that make the robot move on land and water. This robot is powered by the sun, no batteries required. There are two levels in building the robot kit. Level one includes : Turtle, Beetle, Quadru, Boat, Walker, Dog & Wheel. After they amuse themselves with the entry level, can challenge their manipulative skills Level two includes: Roll-e Poly, Auto, Slither, Surfer, Zombie, Crab & Row. Additional features includes: adjustable polarity on the solar panel to change direction of motor rotation, retractable robot head which can be quickly stored in the upper body, the robot head can be installed in the front, top or rear of the gearbox, and a transparent housing to see the movements of the gears. No batteries required - When the sun shines on the solar panel, the panel makes electricity - Will also work when close to a strong artificial light source - A fun demonstration of solar power.

Title: InproSolar 7 in 1 Solar E Station
Body (HTML):
When was the last time you were amazed, we present you the future in miniature, so that when you come you will be familiar with it. A scientific kit: topic energy storage. Renewable energies are revolutionizing the world. Electric vehicles need reliable batteries to reach the greatest possible range. The power of the sun must be stored. Kit 7 in 1 tackles the topic in a playful way. On a Elektrochasy can be built in order 5 different vehicles. The energy to drive comes either from the supplied solar cell or via a capacitor. The tanker can be opened to a solar filling station. In the solar filling station, the solar energy is stored in a condenser, which in turn is connected to 5 different vehicles, each bringing them to drive. For the dull days a battery compartment can charge the capacitor in a few seconds. (2 x AAA batteries are not included). Powered by the condenser, the vehicles become small racing cars. A ramp is about what the little runabouts learn to fly. So you return again and again in the 'box' to the solar station back to recharge the capacitor quickly. It's nice to watch kids play and watch how this technology becomes the reality of our time.

Targeted Group : Unisex
Age : 3 Years & Above
Manufacturer Recommended Age : 3 Years & Above
Are batteries needed to power the product or is this product a battery : No
Is this a Dangerous Good or a Hazardous Material, Substance or Waste that is regulated for transportation, storage, and/or disposal? : No

A Valuable Gift. FIRST FULLY ECOLOGICAL FOUR WHEEL DRIVE OF THE WORLD - Article 2176 kit a model thought out in every detail, where cylinders, pistons, crankshaft visibly start to move. It can be set with two to three drops of salt water repeatedly up to 5 minutes in motion. All moving parts are visible through the blue-transparent plastic. The all-wheel power of the 8-cylinder V engine is charming. 'He works his way through every terrain'. It fascinates and thrills every age. Specially wide all-wheel tires about 50 mm in diameter
- The drive unit with 5 additional magnesium plates (about 20 hours of operation) can be ordered separately (see article 21761). It is a 4Wheelfun such a vehicle itself once to have built.
- A magnesium-air battery provides in conjunction with salt water for the power supply of the vehicle. Salt water is converted into electrical energy.
- A detailed multilingual construction manual accompanies each child / adult step by step through each advanced level. A fascinating experiment - not only for children. The most beautiful BlLD of the ALLRAD SUV for Christmas is awarded by us! We look forward to your feedback.
- The possibility of the classic hydrogen-oxygen-fuel cell drive is topped here with the innovative saltwater drive! NEW - The saltwater propulsion system has recently been installed in a motorcycle. Same technology - even faster - available with 2 fuel cells - the salt water MOTORCYCLE.

Put on propellers 'and then in the right light electricity produced.' The 17 cm large system ensures a pleasant breeze when the solar module installed in the bottom plate of the sun or a halogen spotlight is exposed.

Title: InproSolar Helicopter Natural Solar
Body (HTML):
The first and most popular solar toy in the world! In 1990 the first edition was produced by us in a sheltered workshop. Because the model was so popular, cheaper PLAGIATES soon came into the market in poor workmanship. Only this one is THE ORIGINAL. The workmanship, the design, the proportions, the details - everything is right!
A timelessly beautiful DESIGN object, loved by children and adults.
The solar helicopter is part of the basic equipment of 1000 kindergartens. Experimenting children make their first experiences in dealing with solar energy.
In 1990, I got the idea to build a solar toy, which should quickly find a great popularity with the audience. For the well-known Danish building block manufacturer, a solar accessory should be invented that should fit in the grid of all building blocks. Since the police helicopter was very popular among the children, it came to mind to build a solar rotor for these helicopters. After years of testing, the Danish manufacturers decided not to include our unique solar rotor in the program. Since in the meantime the popularity of the solar engine was so big, the current wooden helicopter was built in all popular children's colors. The natural helicopter is the most popular of the whole colors series. With every solar rotor, an adapter for the well-known components is always delivered, so that children can attach the solar rotor to other components as well.
The oldest landmark of regenerative energy. Since 1990 CO2 free air traffic. High-quality FSC wood processing, European beech, all parts are perfectly matched.
After unpacking, insert the motor shaft of the solar rotor into the wood hole of the helicopter and make sure that the rotor turns easily by hand. If the helicopter is exposed to sunlight, the solar rotor will start to turn and the helicopter is 'ready to take off' Inside, you will need a 20 - 50 W halogen bulb so that the solar rotor starts to rotate with enough light.

Title: Inpro Solar Windgen ABS - White
Body (HTML):
The 4 pieces of ABS plastic parts can be quickly put together and the propeller is already spinning in the sunlight. If there is insufficient sunlight in the interior, a 50 watt halogen light will be enough to keep the wings turning.The smallest solar-powered wind generator, 17 cm.

Robust ABS plastic kit, no glue needed, just put it together
10-year guarantee for the performance of the solar module (installed in the nacelle)
Magnets are built into the bottom plate, so staples in the office stay in good hands
Base plate can be easily printed with a logo

Title: Inpro Solar Wind Generator Wooden FSC 6589
Body (HTML):
All wooden parts very finely turned from European beech. The solar module converts sunlight into electricity. This power drives a small motor, which in turn sets the wind turbine in motion. For the wind vane to rotate, direct sunlight is required or a halogen lamp with at least 100 watts or 50-watt spot can be radiated directly at a distance of max.
When the sun shines on the solar panel, the panel makes electricity - Will also work when close to a strong artificial light source - A fun demonstration of solar power

Title: Inpro Solar Steck Helicopter Solar Rotor
Body (HTML):
First solar plug-in helicopter in the world (year 1990) Solar cell performance guarantee of 10 years
Stiftung Warentest rated our invention of 1990 (the solar rotor) as 'highly recommended'.
With multilingual international stickers and trademarks
Dedicated to all the children of parents, friends and volunteers, who provide your help around the clock for all emergencies (The fire brigade, the ambulance, the Red Cross, the mountain rescue, the stomach David Adom, the Red Crescent, etc
The solar rotor can also be attached to building blocks of the well-known Danish brand with the included adapter. Adapters for other construction brands are also available from us.
Whether at sea or deep in the snow the rescue helicopter brings out everyone with the built-in winch from the most unfavorable circumstances. With the right sticker, the helicopter becomes a fire brigade or ambulance, the Red Cross, Red Half Moon or Magen David Adom, Swiss Heli etc ... The solar rotor rotates in the sunlight as fast as it does just before taking off.

Excellent for demonstrating solar power in action – cover the solar panel and he stops cycling. 14.5 cm long x 12 cm wide x 13 cm high.

Title: Islamic Lanterns Wall Decal Home Decor
Body (HTML):
Size: 60 x 90 cm
Engineered specifically for the wall (and all flat smooth surfaces)
100% safe for kids
Easily Removable
Genuine Quality, from the Designers

Decorating with Wall Decals is the easiest, fastest, coolest and most affordable way to transform a boring painted wall in minutes!  Just peel and stick! 
FAQs About Our Wall Decals:
Where to place your wall decals? On every smooth surface you can think of. You can peel and stick wall decals on any flat, finished surface in your home. They can be safely applied to flat walls and ceilings, doors, sealed wooden furniture, cabinets, counter tops… even your car! And because decal are waterproof, you can even put them in your bathtub or shower. 
Is application easy? Yes! It's as easy as peel and stick! Decals are totally customizable and can be cut or repositioned to fit even in the smallest spaces. Use your imagination and get creative! Even though some of our wall decals come with directions, you don’t have to follow them. Apply each sticker to your wall or surface of choice.
Are wall decals for all ages? They are, but we recommend your child be at least three of years of age when applying wall decals and always have an adult close by. We offer wall decals for all age groups.

Title: CamelBak Chute .6L Charcoal Water Bottle
Body (HTML):
Description

The new Chute .6L water bottle is designed for hydration on demand, whether you're in the backcountry or sitting at your desk. The ergonomic high-flow spout is angled and contoured for efficient, full-on hydration. The leak-proof, tethered cap twists off with just half a turn and conveniently snaps into the handle so it's out of the way when you're drinking. CamelBak even put the threads for the cap on the inside of the spout so you get a comfortable lip seal. And the one-piece tether is twice as clever as any you'll see on the market. It keeps the top locked out of your way for one-handed refills on the go. BPA and BPS-Free. The Chute .6L offers hydration on demand with bright new colors and a leak-proof design that’s small enough to toss in a bag. 
Features

Durable and leak proof, the 0.6-litre Chute water bottle has an angled spout that provides a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling
Hard plastic is 100% free of BPA and BPS, and stands up to frequent use around town and on the trail
Spout cap snaps into the handle to prevent it from getting in the way when drinking; tether securely attaches the cap to the bottle for easy filling
Cap unscrews in just half a turn for quick access to your water
All parts of the Chute bottle are top-rack dishwasher safe
CamelBak Got Your Bak Guarantee: If we built it, we'll Bak it with our lifetime guarantee
Angled spout provides an ergonomic drink interface that delivers a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling
Spout cap snaps into handle to prevent it from getting in the way when drinking
Tether securely attaches the cap to the bottle for easy filling and refilling
Half Turn Cap gives you easy access to your water
The spout cap threads internally so there is no more drinking off those uncomfortable bottle threads
Comfortable to Carry: Handle designed to comfortably carry a full bottle with two fingers
























Smooth Drink Interface

- Capacity: .6L/20 fl oz
- CapMaterial: BPA-Free Polypropylene

Title: CamelBak Chute .75L Rust Water Bottle
Body (HTML):
Description
The new Chute.75L water bottle is designed for hydration on demand, whether you're in the backcountry or sitting at your desk. The ergonomic high-flow spout is angled and contoured for efficient, full-on hydration. The leak-proof, tethered cap twists off with just half a turn and conveniently snaps into the handle so it's out of the way when you're drinking. We even put the threads for the cap on the inside of the spout so you get a comfortable lip seal. And the one-piece tether is twice as clever as any you'll see on the market. It keeps the top locked out of your way for one-handed refills on the go.
Features

BPA-Free
Angled spout provides an ergonomic drink interface that delivers a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling
Spout cap snaps into handle to prevent it from getting in the way when drinking

Wide-mouth opening is easy to fill with ice and water and a breeze to clean

Title: CamelBak Chute .6L Dream Catcher Water Bottle
Body (HTML):
Description
The new Chute .6L water bottle is designed for hydration on demand, whether you're in the backcountry or sitting at your desk. The ergonomic high-flow spout is angled and contoured for efficient, full-on hydration. The leak-proof, tethered cap twists off with just half a turn and conveniently snaps into the handle so it's out of the way when you're drinking. CamelBak even put the threads for the cap on the inside of the spout so you get a comfortable lip seal. And the one-piece tether is twice as clever as any you'll see on the market. It keeps the top locked out of your way for one-handed refills on the go. BPA and BPS-Free. The Chute .6L offers hydration on demand with bright new colors and a leak-proof design that’s small enough to toss in a bag. 
Features

Durable and leak proof, the 0.6-litre Chute water bottle has an angled spout that provides a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling
Hard plastic is 100% free of BPA and BPS, and stands up to frequent use around town and on the trail
Spout cap snaps into the handle to prevent it from getting in the way when drinking; tether securely attaches the cap to the bottle for easy filling
Cap unscrews in just half a turn for quick access to your water
All parts of the Chute bottle are top-rack dishwasher safe
CamelBak Got Your Bak Guarantee: If we built it, we'll Bak it with our lifetime guarantee
Angled spout provides an ergonomic drink interface that delivers a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling
Spout cap snaps into handle to prevent it from getting in the way when drinking
Tether securely attaches the cap to the bottle for easy filling and refilling
Half Turn Cap gives you easy access to your water
The spout cap threads internally so there is no more drinking off those uncomfortable bottle threads
Comfortable to Carry: Handle designed to comfortably carry a full bottle with two fingers

Title: CamelBak eddy Kids .4L Daisy Chain Water Bottle
Body (HTML):
Description
The CamelBak Kids' eddy® water bottle features a spill-resistant design and fun graphics to keep you and your kids happy. 100% free of BPA, BPS and BPF. Recommended for ages 3 - 8.
Features

Just the Right Bite: Combining the patented CamelBak Big Bite™ Valve with a stem tube and shut-off valve, this detachable one-piece component is simple for kids to use and simple for parents to clean.
Never Spill: Easy for small fingers to operate.
Safe and Easy: Simplified stem and straw are child-safe yet easy to remove for cleaning. All parts are dishwasher safe (top rack only).
Stain-resistant and taste-free Tritan™ is 100% Free of BPA, BPS and BPF. Kid-sized, fun and easy to clean, this bottle is ready for any adventure.
Not for children under 3 years.

Specifications

BPA/BPS/BPF Free:Yes




Dimensions:7.6 x 10 x 19 cm / 3 x 4 x 7.5 in




Material:Eastman Tritan™ Copolyester. Tritan makes the eddy® clear, vibrant, durable, dishwasher safe and 100% BPA-Free.

Title: CamelBak eddy .6L Floral Hearts Water Bottle
Body (HTML):
Description
Enjoy spill-proof sipping at work or on the trail with the .6L. CamelBak eddy water bottle. This bottle is made from 100% BPA- and BPS-free Eastman Tritan Copolyester that is safe and durable. The leak-proof cap has a silicone Big Bite Valve that allows you to flip, bite and sip for fast, simple operating without having to tip the bottle up. The components are top-rack dishwasher safe and the bottle has a wide-mouth opening to make cleaning and adding ice easy. An integrated top handle means you can attach it to a pack with a carabiner or just carry it with one finger.

Title: CamelBak Podium 21oz - Dirt Series Stealth Water Bottle
Body (HTML):
The Podium® Dirt Series is designed for those who want to take their adventures to the dirt without tasting it. As the ultimate bike bottle for both recreational and competitive cyclists alike, it features an integrated mud cap to keep the dirt out of your drink, a high-flow self-sealing jet valve and easy to squeeze ergonomic design.




FEATURES


Integrated Mud Cap: Keeps dirt out of the nozzle
Innovative Self-Sealing Jet Valve™ Eliminates splatters and spills
Removable Nozzle: For easy cleaning
Positive Lockout: For leak-proof transport
BPA, BPS & BPF FREE TRUTASTE™ POLYPROPYLENE WITH HYDROGUARD™ Taste your beverage, not the bottle


SPECIFICATIONS





CAPACITY:620ml/21 fl oz




CAPMATERIAL:BPA-Free TruTaste™ Polypropylene. Bite Valve Material: The Jet Valve™ is made from medical grade, self-sealing silicone




CLOSURE:Leak-Proof




COLLECTION:Bike & Sport Insulated




ACTIVITY:Sport & Bike




USER:Unisex




BPA/BPS/BPF FREE:Yes




DIMENSIONS:7 x 7 x 22 cm / 2.75 x 2.75 x 8.5 in




MATERIAL:BPA-Free TruTaste™ Polypropylene




WEIGHT:91 g / 3.2 oz








FEATURED TECHNOLOGY



MUD CAP
The mud cap feature helps keep dirt out and your water clean while you are busy shredding. 



JET VALVE
The self-sealing valve delivers a high flow of water and eliminates annoying drips and spills. Positive lockout for leakproof transport.

Title: CamelBak eddy Kids Accessory Bite Valve Multi-pack
Body (HTML):
Camelbak Eddy Kids Bottle replacement Bite Valves - latest improved version - Improved anti spill bite valve - Suitable for all Camelbak Eddy Kids bottles - child safe yet easy to remove - Improved anti spill bite valve - Suitable for all Camelbak Eddy Kids bottles - child safe yet easy to remove for cleaning - BPA Free - dishwasher safe (please note colours/patterns may fade over time) - Not for children under 3 years - Suitable for Eddy Kids bottles only - Supplied as single item (multipack option of 4 also available) - Please Note: The self sealing silicone bite valve can sometimes seal tightly before first use. To open, squeeze the bite valve and twist and roll between your fingertips. This should loosen the seal and open it up for drinking. - These are not bite proof and will wear with use. This can cause leakage as they wear out.Personalize your eddy® Kids bottle with 4 colorful, child-safe bite valves.

Title: CamelBak Chute Mag 1L Sea Glass
Body (HTML):
DESCRIPTION

The versatile and well-loved Chute® bottle has been improved to feature a NEW magnetic top that easily stows the cap. Our most popular size, the 32 oz, is perfect for all day hydration wherever you're headed. Drink freely from the Chute® Mag thanks to an angled spout that provides a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling. This durable and leak-proof favorite is still 100% free of BPA, BPS and BPF and now even better at keeping the cap out of the way for easy, one-handed drinking or pouring.

Magnetic Handle: Keeps the cap stowed while drinking

Dishwasher Safe: All parts are top-rack dishwasher safe

Title: CamelBak Water Bottle Forge Vacuum 12oz Blaze
Body (HTML):
DESCRIPTION

Forge ahead without spills on early-morning rides. Sometimes water just isn’t enough—that’s why we reinvented the travel mug for a better on-the-go coffee and tea experience. The double-walled, vacuum-insulated steel vessel keeps 12 oz. of coffee or tea piping hot for 6 hours, with an impact cap that prevents dents or cracks if you drop it. When you need to keep your eyes on the trail, the self-sealing cap lets you drink one-handed, and the smaller 12 oz. design makes it easy to toss in your pack without worrying about leaks or spills. For frequent sipping, just press the top button to lock the cap open. The cap won’t collect grime, either—just pop up the arms for easy cleaning in the sink or dishwasher.




FEATURES


One-handed self-sealing lever
Leak-proof closure
Lock-open button for frequent sipping
Arms flip up for easy cleaning
Vacuum insulation stays hot 6 hours
Impact cap helps protect against accidental drops

ACTIVITY:Travel Mugs




BPA/BPS/BPF FREE:Yes

MATERIAL:18/8 Stainless Steel

Body (HTML):

One-handed self-sealing lever

Impact cap

DESCRIPTION

Our newest insulated travel mug comes in a spectrum of bright, super-saturated colours. The Forge Divide is all-terrain mug that makes it easy to drink coffee or tea one-handed, with a drinking valve that opens with the press of a button, and then seals shut to prevent leaks or spills. The leak-proof cap means you can confidently toss the Forge Divide into your bag without soaking your stuff. If you are sipping more frequently, just press the lockout button to keep the cap open. Ready to clean your mug? The drinking valve pops open for easy cleaning there are not any hidden parts that will collect gunk.

The Forge Divide is all-terrain mug that makes it easy to drink coffee or tea one-handed, with a drinking valve that opens with the press of a button, and then seals shut to prevent leaks or spills. The leak-proof cap means you can confidently toss the Forge Divide into your bag without soaking your stuff. If you are sipping more frequently, just press the lockout button to keep the cap open. Ready to clean your mug? The drinking valve pops open for easy cleaning there are not any hidden parts that will collect gunk.

Title: CamelBak Chute Mag Vacuum Insulated 32oz Jet Water Bottle
Body (HTML):
FEATURES

Magnetic Handle: Keeps the cap stowed while drinking
Vacuum Insulation: Keeps beverages cold for 24 hours and hot for 6 hours
Angled Spout: Provides an ergonomic drink interface that delivers a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling
Internal Cap Threads: No more drinking off those uncomfortable bottle threads
Hand wash vessel only
Wide-Mouth Opening: Easy to fill with ice and water and a breeze to clean

DESCRIPTION
With the 32 oz NEW Chute® Mag Vacuum, you can get a cold drink and a smooth pour every time. The new magnetic top keeps the cap out of the way while you drink. This vacuum-insulated bottle keeps liquids cold for 24 hours (even longer if you add ice), and hot for six. The sturdy, double-walled steel design keeps condensation from collecting on the sides of the bottle, and the powder-coat paint job adds some extra color. The narrow-mouthed opening also makes it easy to drink and pour without spilling, so you won’t waste a single drop. After all, nobody wants to refresh or refuel with a lukewarm drink.

Title: Camelbak KickBak 30oz Bonfire International Bottle Flask
Body (HTML):
FEATURES

Magnetic Handle: Keeps the cap stowed while drinking
Vacuum Insulation: Keeps beverages cold for 24 hours and hot for 6 hours
Angled Spout: Provides an ergonomic drink interface that delivers a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling
Internal Cap Threads: No more drinking off those uncomfortable bottle threads
Hand wash vessel only
Wide-Mouth Opening: Easy to fill with ice and water and a breeze to clean

DESCRIPTION
With the 32 oz NEW Chute® Mag Vacuum, you can get a cold drink and a smooth pour every time. The new magnetic top keeps the cap out of the way while you drink. This vacuum-insulated bottle keeps liquids cold for 24 hours (even longer if you add ice), and hot for six. The sturdy, double-walled steel design keeps condensation from collecting on the sides of the bottle, and the powder-coat paint job adds some extra color. The narrow-mouthed opening also makes it easy to drink and pour without spilling, so you won’t waste a single drop. After all, nobody wants to refresh or refuel with a lukewarm drink.

Title: CamelBak Podium Ice 21 oz Silver
Body (HTML):
DESCRIPTION

Keep your water cold 4X longer! We re-engineered our legendary Podium® Ice™ to be the ultimate bike bottle. With unmatched insulation properties, high flow rate and easy cleanability, Podium Ice stands second to none. 100% free of BPA, BPS and BPF.




FEATURES


Aerogel Insulation keeps water cold four times as long as regular sport bottles
Innovative, self-sealing Jet Valve™ eliminates splatters and spills.
Lightweight, easy-squeeze bottle delivers the right flow to quench your thirst
Removable nozzle for easy cleaning
TruTaste™ polypropylene with HydroGuard™ lets you taste your water, not your bottle
Positive lockout for leakproof transport
Wide-mouth opening is easy to fill with ice and water and a breeze to clean
Keeps warm beverages warm during cool weather rides

Millions of tin cans are being wasted daily. Help recycle one of them and turn it into a cool robot which walks in a silly way when it is turned on. Assemble a smart robotic crab that can detect the edges of any platform and make swift turns to avoid falling off. Turn it on, put it on the table and watch it perform stunning acrobatics. No batteries included. Suitable for children aged 8 and above.

Build a smart robotic crab

Build your own multi-functional weather station then observe and record the weather. Create a terrarium by adding a plastic bottle and grow a plant in greenhouse conditions. With thermometer, compass, wind vane, anemometer and rain gauge.

Track weather changes with this Kidz Labs Green Science Weather Station
Learn facts about the weather and do experiments on the greenhouse effect
Multi-function science kit
Part of the Green Science education range

Potato Clock is a digital clock powered by a potatoes, yes 'no batteries'. This kit demonstrate the basic principles of electricity and its mechanics. Title: 4M Kidz Labs Green Science Solar Rover
Body (HTML):
Description
Place your solar rover on a smooth floor surface on a sunny day. Watch it goes without battery. Learn how sun light is turned into energy. It's a cool green science project.

Title: 4M Kidz Labs Green Science Solar Robot
Body (HTML):

A selection of our best selling kits are endorsed by the Science Museum and are available in Science Museum packaging. Learn how to make a moving robot using solar panels and a motor. Put all the parts together and teach your robot to do simple tasks. It can be your friend as well as your helper. This Solar Robot is not only educational but it is fun and creative, giving hours of entertainment. A fun and creative kit. Ideal birthday presents, Christmas gifts or stocking filler.

Create moving robot
Learn how to use solar panels
Teach your robot what to do
Hours of fun
Ideal for birthday presents

Body (HTML):

Learn about Green Energy and make your own Rocket with this amazing set from 4M! Made from trash and powered by green energy, this is the perfect way of teaching children about recycling and green energy. Enjoy blasting fun by recycling two drink bottles and a few old magazine pages. Stamp on the empty bottle and watch your rocket fly up to 25 meters (80ft). Learn the underlying physics with this cool green science project. Suitable for children aged eight years and above.

Learn about Green Energy and make your own Rocket with this amazing set
All it takes to complete this set is two drinks bottles and an old magazine
Watch your rocket fly up to 80 foot up in the air
Learn the underlying physics with this cool green science project

Title: 4M Kidz Labs Buzz Wire Making Kit
Body (HTML):
Description

Construct your own Buzz Wire and learn how to complete an electric circuit. Challenge your friends with the exciting Buzz Wire game. Move the wand along the Buzz Wire from one end to another. Not for children under 3 yrs.

Title: 4M Kidz Labs Spy Science Intruder Alarm
Body (HTML):

Title: 4M Kidz Labs Kaleidoscope Making Kit
Body (HTML):
Description
Create your own Kaleidoscope with millions of dazzling patterns in the viewing chamber. 25 cm long kaleidoscope which object chamber is specially designed with a removable cover. Simply change the different trinkets included and make a color changing kaleidoscope, or a mystic glow kaleidoscope, or a sparkling holographic kaleidoscope, or a snowflake kaleidoscope. You could also put in your favorite trinkets to create your very own style kaleidoscopes.

Title: 4M Kidz Labs Metal Detector Robot
Body (HTML):
DESCRIPTION





Let your future scientist hunt for hidden metallic objects with his very own 4M Fun Science Kidz Labs/Metal Detector Robot Educational Toy. This fantastic science kit from 4M lets your child have hands on learning experience with electronics. This metal detector robot can be controlled by a remote to drive the robot back and forth seamlessly. This educational toy also lets you learn the principles behind how a robot works. The kit comes along with all the necessary parts needed to build a robot, and a detailed instruction manual to make assembling easier.
KEY FEATURES



8 to 15 years - Unisex 



WIRED REMOTE CONTROL
This cool metal detecting robot will be a great addition to your child’s creative toy collection. It not only lets your kid have fun but also allows him/her to understand the principles behind how a robot works. Your child can drive the robot back and forth with its wired remote control. The detector will beep when it finds a metallic object on the ground.





DETACHABLE METAL DETECTOR
The metal detecting unit can be detached from the robot body and used as a handheld unit or can be carried on a handy key chain too. In order to detect the presence of a metal, he/she has to hold it close to the object.

Title: 4M Kidz Labs / Spy Science Alarm Protective Money Bank
Body (HTML):
Description
Build and configure the digital lock, install an alarm buzzer. Challenge your friend and family unlocking it, they will be amazed. It's a fun project to learning a lock structure and connecting a wire.

Title: 4M Kidz Labs / Triceratops Skeleton Excavation
Body (HTML):

Features

Construct this easy-to-build insectoid and discover the mechanisms behind robotic movement.

Title: 4M Kidz Labs / Sci-Toys Lab
Body (HTML):
Features:


Learn about the scientific principles behind forces, pressure, chemical electricity and more while having fun with this set.
Containing experiments covering 8 various subjects, this kit has enough activities for family and friends.
With a pocket volcano, a diving submarine, a set of mind reading cards, and more, learn about topics in physics, chemistry, and mathematics.
Follow the detailed, in-color directions and get an adult's help to complete the experiments.
Challenge your child's imagination with 4M toys and kits.


Description:
Power the LED clock with a lemon, make a volcano erupt in your palm, recycle two bottles to make a giant tornado on your table-top, have fun while you learn about the scientific principles behind forces, pressure, chemical electricity and more! This kit contains experiments covering 8 physics, chemistry and mathematics topics. Contains a pocket volcano, a diving submarine, a set of mind reading cards, a micro rocket with launching pad, a diving octopus, an LED clock with wires for Lemon Clock experiment, a tornado maker, a cosmic jet racer with balloon and mouth piece, and detailed coloured instructions. (Materials required from home: vinegar, baking soda, baking powder, bath fizzer, clean drinks bottles and lemon. Ask for adults permission and assistance in getting these materials for the experiments.)

Title: Roman Boy Costume
Body (HTML):
Includes a White Robe
Attached shoulder Drape
A Belt & Cuffs
A Headpiece





Description
The Romans were experts when it comes to the art of war and the business of politics. Those are two very stressful trades that the Roman Empire excelled in. So whenever given the opportunity to take a break from it all, the Roman’s took full advantage. Their leisure time started with the garbs they wore, loose fitting togas and sandals. So, with this awesome Roman Boy’s Costume, your little Emperor will instead be fitted with a cozy robe that matches the style of ancient Roman fashion. There is even a red shoulder drape to give the outfit a more authentic feel. Once you grab your kiddo a pair of Roman Sandals his transformation will be complete! He’s sure to give everyone a delightful blast to the past with this historic costume.
Perfect for any fancy dress party, World Book Day or School Play.

Title: Fitbit Charge 2 Accessory Sport Band Cobalt Blue Small
Body (HTML):
Description
Featuring a breathable, perforated design, these sport bands were tested, endorsed and approved by Fitbit Ambassadors like ultramarathoner Dean Karnazes, cycling legend Jens Voigt and pro-runners Ryan & Sara Hall.
 
Specs
Materials
The Fitbit Charge 2 sport band is made of a flexible, durable elastomer material similar to that used in many sports watches, and includes a surgical-grade stainless steel buckle.

 Water Resistance
The Charge 2 sport band is sweat, rain and splash proof, but is not swim proof. We recommend taking it off before showering, as it’s best for your skin if the band stays dry and clean.

 Care
If the Charge 2 sport band gets wet or if you sweat in it, remove and completely dry the band before putting it back on. Give your wrist a rest by taking the band off every now and then.
